name: Alyeska Helicopters
about: Alyeska Helicopters, located in Anchorage, Alaska, offers comprehensive helicopter flight training at Merrill Field Airport. As an accredited FAA Part 141 flight school and VA-approved institution, we provide personalized, one-on-one instruction in the Robinson R22 and R44 helicopters. Our training programs include initial certification for new pilots, add-on certificate courses for current pilots, and recurrent training. The unique Alaskan environment provides an advantageous setting for learning, preparing students to fly in diverse and challenging conditions. Our experienced instructors tailor training schedules to fit individual needs, ensuring students learn at their own pace. With Alyeska Helicopters, you can gain the skills and confidence to fly anywhere.
